Edmonton

PrimeBane wrote: â†‘Locations of Pizza 73: http://www.pizza73.com/locations.html

Yes, mostly Alberta, no, not mostly Calgary... Edmonton actually has more locations.

Their pizza is pretty good most of the time.

Yup, Edmonton based private company bought by Pizza Pizza a year or two ago. I was a loyal customer but their pizzas seems to have gone down in quality since the takeover. My last large Double Pepperoni pizza got me asking, "where is the meat" and also "where is the cheese". I would hate to see the new single pepperoni pizza. Hopefully it is just the new franchisee in my area.
